section.name: genesis' Downloads
section.p: There are several distribution files available for downloading. They are:

ul.li: genesis-bin-{version}.tar.gz e genesis-bin-{version}.zip: genesis binary distribution. This archive has the following files: genesis jars only and an empty project which can be used to start a new genesis application. This archive does not contain any dependent jar file from outside frameworks such as Hibernate.

genesis-full-bin-{version}.tar.gz e genesis-full-bin-{version}.zip: genesis full binary distribution. This archive contains the following files: all files as the archive above together with the necessary jar files from Hibernate, Apache Commons and Thinlet frameworks. An empty project is also provided within this archive.

genesis-full-bin-plus-docs-{version}.tar.gz e genesis-full-bin-plus-docs-{version}.zip: genesis full binary distribution and documentation. This archive contais all jars as the above archive together with complete genesis documentation. Besides an empty project for starting a new genesis application some simple examples are also provided: a simple calculator (SimpleCalculator) and a user administration application (Useradmin).
genesis-src-{version}.tar.gz e genesis-src-{version}.zip: genesis source code.
genesis-src-plus-docs-{version}.tar.gz e genesis-src-plus-docs-{version}.zip: genesis source code and genesis complete documentation.
modified-xdoclet-1.2.zip: modified xdoclet 1.2 distribution files for adicional tasks.

section.p: All distribution files for this release can be found here.
